amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-411 to state that nothing in this Act shall be construed as to contradict existing law regarding terrorism transcending national boundaries, harboring or concealing terrorists, or providing material support to terrorists.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-411 to state that nothing in this Act shall be construed as to contradict existing law regarding terrorism transcending national boundaries, harboring or concealing terrorists, or providing material support to terrorists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rose (NY) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Rose (NY).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose (NY) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
